DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects mail-related events from devices running Sendmail software.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.pattern: sendmail\[\d+\]: [^:]+: from=[^,]+, size=\d+, class=\d+, nrcpts=\d+, msgid=[^,]+,.* relay=.+

FastFormatter.format: From: "$4", MsgID: "$8", Daemon: "$12"

FastPattern.pattern: sendmail\[\d+\]: [^:]+: to=\S+,(?: ctladdr=[^,]+,)? delay=[\d+:]+, xdelay=[\d:]+, mailer=\w+, pri=\d+,.* dsn=[.\d]+, stat=.+

FastFormatter.format: $3, SendMail Status: $12
$3, SendMail Persistent Transient Failure: $12
$3, SendMail Permanent Failure: $12
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Other undefined Status"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Other address status"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Bad destination mailbox address"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Bad destination system address"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Bad destination mailbox address syntax"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Destination mailbox address ambiguous"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Destination address valid"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Destination mailbox has moved, No forwarding address"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Bad sender's mailbox address syntax"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Bad sender's system address"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Other or undefined mailbox status"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Mailbox disabled, not accepting messages"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Mailbox full"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Message length exceeds administrative limit"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Mailing list expansion problem"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Other or undefined mail system status"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Mail system full"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 System not accepting network messages"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 System not capable of selected features"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Message too big for system"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Other or undefined network or routing status"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 No answer from host"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Bad connection"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Directory server failure"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Unable to route"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Mail system congestion"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Routing loop detected"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Delivery time expired"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Other or undefined protocol status"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Invalid command"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Syntax error"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Too many recipients"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Invalid command arguments"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Wrong protocol version"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Other or undefined media error"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Media not supported"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Conversion required and prohibited"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Conversion required but not supported"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Conversion with loss performed"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Conversion Failed"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Other or undefined security status"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Delivery not authorized, message refused"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Mailing list expansion prohibited"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Security conversion required but not possible"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Security features not supported"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Cryptographic failure"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Cryptographic algorithm not supported"
To: "$4", Mailer: "$8", Status Code: "$11 Message integrity failure"

FastPattern.pattern: sendmail\[\d+\]: [^:]+: from=[^,]+, size=\d+, class=\d+, nrcpts=\d+, msgid=[^,]+,.* relay=.+

FastFormatter.format: From: "$4", MsgID: "$8", Daemon: "$12"

FastPattern.pattern: [-\w]+\[\d+\]: STARTTLS=[^,]+, relay=[^,]+, version=[/\w]+, verify=[A-Z]+, cipher=[-\w]+, bits=\d+/\d+

FastFormatter.format: Verify: "$6 (verification succeeded)"
Verify: "$6 (no cert presented)"
Verify: "$6 (no cert requested)"
Verify: "$6 (cert presented but could not be verified)"
Verify: "$6 (STARTTLS has not been performed)"
Verify: "$6 (temporary error occurred)"
Verify: "$6 (some protocol error occurred at the ESMTP level)"
Verify: "$6 (STARTTLS handshake failed, which is a fatal error for this session, the e-mail will be queued)"

FastPattern.description: 5, ServiceWarning, cannot save rejected email anywhere
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ sendmail\[\d+\]: [^:]+:(?: [^:]+:)? [^:]+: cannot save rejected email anywhere
\d+ [-\w.]+ [-\w]+\[\d+\]: [^:]+: [^:]+: return to sender: Cannot send message
\d+ [-\w.]+ sendmail\[\d+\]: [^:]+: Authentication-Warning: [-\w.]+: \S+ set sender to [-\w@.]+ using -(?:r|f)
sendmail\[\d+\]: [^:]+: to=\S+, delay=[\d+:]+, mailer=\w+, pri=\d+, stat=.+
\d+ [-\w.]+ sendmail\[\d+\]: [^:]+: [^:]+: sender notify: Warning: could not send message for

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) \w+ sSMTP\[\d+\]: Sent mail for (\S+) \(.*?\) uid=(\S+) username=(\S+) outbytes=(\d+).*
FastPattern.pattern: sSMTP\[\d+\]: Sent mail for \S+ \(.*?\) uid=\S+ username=\S+ outbytes=\d+

FastPattern.description: 21, ServiceWarning, {Cannot open mail, Unable to connect}
